text: vivaham kalikkan kalivillattavar allahu tanre audaryattal avare svantam kalil nilkkan karutturravarakkunvare sadacaranistha palikkanam. ninnalute atimakalil meacanakkararilerppetan agrahikkunnavarumayi ninnal meacanakkararuntakkuka. avaril nanmayullatayi ninnalkku beadhyamuntenkil! allahu ninnalkkekiya avanre dhanattilninn avarkk keatukkukayum ceyyuka. bhetikanettam keaticc, ninnalute atimastrikale- avar caritravatikalayi jivikkanagrahikkumpeal- ninnal vesyavrttikk nirbandhikkarut. arenkilumavare atinu nirbandhikkukayanenkil a nirbandhitareat allahu ere pearukkunnavanum paramakarunikanumallea
